Steven Soderbergh’s KIMI is a really clever mash-up of REAR WINDOW, THE CONVERSATION, and PANIC ROOM, but updated for Alexa tech & COVID-19. It’s really sharp, and might go down as one of the best movies about everyday pandemic life. https://t.co/tga6H8vh1o
